ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( !ISBLANK( TEXT (PRIORVALUE(RW_Lead_Sub_Source__c))), ISCHANGED( RW_Lead_Sub_Source__c),$Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", $Profile.Name <> "Sales Strategy" ,$Label.Disable_all_validations_from_lead == "false" /*Added by Prashant to control disabling all validations together*/)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Lead sub source cannot be changed
